```{r setup, include = F}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

NOTE: RUN ONLY AT THE BEGINNING, i.e. when downloading data for the first time.

## Initiate Connection

```{r connection, warning = F, message = F, error = T}
con <- DBI::dbConnect(odbc::odbc(), "betting_ds")
```

## Create `t_optimal_bets`
```{sql Calendar, connection = con, warning = F, message = F, error = T}
drop table if exists t_optimal_bets;
create table if not exists t_optimal_bets (
analysis_time timestamp without time zone not null,
created_at date not null,
hometeam varchar(50) not null,
awayteam varchar(50) not null,
fullname varchar(250) not null,
tipsport_league varchar(250) not null,
dateclosed timestamp without time zone not null,
model varchar(50) not null,
p_prob real,
kelly_criterion real,
rate real,
opt_stake real);
```
